name: pyload
description: pyLoad is a self-hosted download manager focused on file hosting services and automation. It supports plugins, scheduling, and a web UI for queue management and link handling.
features: Multi-host support: Download from hundreds of file hosting services including Mega, Rapidgator, and MediaFire.
Queue management: Organize downloads in queues with priorities, categories, and scheduling.
Plugin system: Extend functionality with plugins for new hosters, captcha solvers, and automation.
Captcha solving: Automatically solve captchas using OCR or integration with solving services.
Link extraction: Extract download links from container files like DLC, CCF, and RSDF.
Scheduled downloads: Set download times to take advantage of off-peak hours or unlimited bandwidth periods.
Web interface: Manage downloads through a responsive web UI accessible from any device.
Account management: Store premium account credentials for faster downloads and no waiting times.
Automatic reconnection: Handle connection interruptions with automatic retry and resume capabilities.
Download limits: Set bandwidth limits and concurrent download restrictions to manage network usage.
API access: Control downloads programmatically using a RESTful API for automation.
Notification system: Receive alerts when downloads complete, fail, or require captcha solving.
